reviewText: I love Mac's voice and I love the arrangements of some of these tried-and-true Christmas carols.  Don't miss this one!  Highly recommend!

reviewText: Experience a night of Christmas worship with Third Day's latest installment to its acclaimed Offerings worship series. Recorded live during the band's Christmas Offerings Tour, this new DVD is a great addition to any Third Day collection. Featuring a unique blend of Christmas classics, originals and some of Third Day's most well known worship songs, this unparalleled project will bring the spirit of Christmas into homes everywhere, this season and many seasons to come.Songs:1. O Come All Ye Faithful2. Do You Hear What I Hear3. King Of Glory4. Born In Bethlehem5. What Child Is This?6. Christmas Like A Child7. Show Me Your Glory8. Angels We Have Heard On High9. Your Love Oh Lord10. Merry Christmas11. O Holy Night12. Jesus, Light Of The World13. God Of Wonders14. Creed

reviewText: OUTSTANDING!!! THIRD DAY JUST KEEPS GETTING BETTER AND BETTER!!! THIS IS AN EXCELLENT CONCERT DVD THAT WELL EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS!!! THIS CONCERT ROCKS!!! THIRD DAY HAS DONE A BRILLIENT JOB IN BRIDGING TOGETHER "ROCK", "GOSPEL" AND "CHRISTMAS" MUSIC!!! THIS BAND AND THIS CONCERT IS PHENONMENAL!!! EVEN THOUGH IT HAS A "CHRISTMAS" THEME, IT IS A CONCERT FOR ANY TIME OF THE YEAR. IT'S GOSPEL, IT'S ROCK, IT'S CHRISTMAS, IT TESTIMONY AND WORSHIP. IT GIVES YOU A VERY WONDERFUL,AND POSITIVE FEELING!!! THE CROWD IS REALLY INTO THIS ONE, MAKING IT MORE SPECIAL!!!It was filmed at the "Fellowship of the Woodlands, in Houston, Texas. It has a running time of approx. 74 minutes.THE ATMOSPHERE IS AWESOME!!! THEY WENT TO A LOT OF WORK TO PREPARE FOR THIS ON. YOU GET SNOWFLAKES IN THE BACKGROUND, THE STAGE IS VERY WELL DECORATED. YOU GET A BIG SCREEN WITH THE WORDS TO THE SONGS ON IT, SO YOU CAN SING ALONG.It consists of the following songs:O come all ye FaithfulDo you hear what I hearKing of GloryBorn in BethlehemWhat Child is this?Christmas like a ChildShow me Your GloryAngels We have Heard on HIghYOur Love Oh Lord (SOMEWHERE'S AROUND THIS PART - YOU GET AND IMPROMTOPERFORMANCE OF "NOTHING BUT THE BLOOD OF JESUS" -  "OH PRECIOUS IS THE FLOW, THAT MAKES ME WHITE AS SNOW"THE SNOWFLAKES IN THE BACKGROUND MAKES IT MORE SPECIAL!!!!Merry ChristmasO Holy NightJesus, Light of the WorldGod of WondersCreedThroughout the concert, band members give testimonies and even give invitations to the crowd to come and pray (they even have people ready to pray with them.THIS IS JUST AN AWESOME CONCERT, WORDS JUST CAN'T DESCRIBE IT!!! IT GIVES YOU THIS WONDERFUL, WONDERFUL FEELING!!! I THANK GOD FOR THIRD DAY!!! THEY REALLY DID GOOD ON THIS ONE, IT SEEMS EVERYTHING IS JUST RIGHT!!! I DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS ONE!!!

reviewText: This is an awesome celebration of Christmas with fabulous Third Day original songs and beloved Christmas classics. We found ourselves singing along to the songs. Christmas Offerings is what celebrating Christmas is all about. We did not want it to end. We are thrilled to have it in our collection of concerts, and look forward to watching it every year with family and friends during the Christmas season. What a gift and a blessing.
summary: What Christmas celebrations are all about!

reviewText: I love this dvd so much that I listen to it all year long. Its so good that it gave me a new apprecation for all the songs on the selection list. God bless Third Day.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Third Day continues to impress on Christmas Offerings DVD. Earlier this year they released Revelation, one of their best recordings. The same excellence found on that CD is featured on this DVD.This offers a fine collection of songs ranging from Christmas classics, a few originals and some of the band's signature songs. The latter includes wonderful versions of "King of Glory," "Show Me Your Glory," "Your Love, Oh Lord," "God of Wonders," and a rousing finale of "Creed," written by Rich Mullins. These songs broaden the appeal, making this something that could be watched any time of the year.Nevertheless, the Christmas element is prominent. Lead singer Mac Powell frequently encourages the audience to sing along in what the band hopes will be a worship experience. Even so, the music is what makes this a first-class Christmas DVD.Third Day's God-directed lyrics are accompanied by a pop/rock sound that is especially engaging on this DVD. They do remarkably strong versions of Christmas songs in their own style. The six-piece band performs against a starry backdrop with lighting and images that evoke the season.Among my favorite moments are introductions from guitarist Brad Avery and bass player Tai Anderson. Anderson affirms that bass players can do more than generate throbbing sounds.It all starts with an extremely well-done intro consisting of concert clips mixed with shots of band members off stage. This 2007 concert was filmed at Fellowship of the Woodlands in The Woodlands, Texas.During the performance Mac Powell states that Third Day never had plans for a Christmas concert, but they were pleased with the results. Those who see this will also appreciate what they have done. Third Day has given us a gift worthy of the season.
summary: A Christmas concert that includes Third Day classics
Title: N/A
